name: Polartec 200 DWR Water Repellant Fleece Hoody Made in Colorado
description:
Premium Polartec 200 Fleece Hoody
DWR Water Repellant
Made in Denver, Colorado USA

Choice of:
Red contrast one way front zipper or
Black 2 way front zipper

Charcoal main body color
Mid Weight Layer 
Great tool around town mountain jacket
Intricate Design think NF Denali
Ribbed cuff and pocket trim
two large non zip interior pockets fit 12oz cans
cinching multi piece hood design
2 way waist cinch
behind zipper wind flap
signature wave front and rear yoke like our jackets

WASH this garment alone in cold water and separate 
from other items.  The DWR treatment will deteriorate 
with repeated washings.

Fit is bigger than say Arcteryx for instance

6'1" 205 lb 41" chest can wear Large

name: Fremont Non Hooded Jacket 3 Layer Waterproof Breathable Made in Colorado
description:
Fremont Snow Jacket  $289.99 
On Sale 1 Week Only Limited Sizes Available
$225


Windproof, Waterproof fabric, Highly breathable

Made in Colorado by people who live full time in the mountains and test in the mountains daily...

DWR coated Nylon Face/PTFE Membrane with Polyester Micro Velour Fleece lining- Waterproof seam taped seams.  Breathability helps disperse moisture from the body that would be retained by an ordinary hardshell. Easily warm enough for temps into the minus teens with proper base layers.

Named for Fremont Pass in the Northern Ten Mile / Sawatch Range.  Fremont is a co-designed with a former major outdoor label design engineer.


Click on image for larger view

* Made-in-Colorado USA

* Hybrid wind proof laminate jacket

* Tough exterior shell without the noise of a hardshell

* Drytex 3-layer PTFE membrane fabric

* Chest yoke and elbows overlay in reinforced, waterproof 420 Denier PU Coated Nylon for tree branch strikes and rock protection

* Main body fabric runs from Neckline to bottom with no breaks for increased strength and durability
  
* Micro polyester insulator layer (looks like pool table felt) 

* Exceptional breathing qualities minimize goggle fogging   

* Adjustable and over-sized fleece-lined collar easily covers the face eliminating the need for a face mask or balaclava.   

* Cuffs easily accommodate "under" or "over" gloves 

* Additional breathing venting features, such as the YKK one-handed pull, pit zippers, 2-way front-separating zipper.  Zippers can be easily operated with gloved hand   

* Wind-block panel behind front zipper  

* Interior has 2 non-closing, roomy pockets to carry skins or extra goggles and one nice sized zippered pocket  

* Exterior has three YKK zippered pockets, including two side pockets which are single-sided and fleece-lined  

* Dual-adjusting cinch that serves as a powder skirt when needed.  

The Fremont represents the pinnacle of American-Made Quality and technology at an affordable price.   Large weighs 1006 grams. Two word summary....Bomber Proof!   

Red exterior/Black interior
Black exterior/Black interior


Don't Like High Collar all the time? Watch this for tip:
<iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/q0U6_-qyhyo" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>


Shipping is $8 when purchased alone, or adds $3 with the purchase of another item.

DWR coated Nylon Face/PTFE Membrane with Polyester Micro Velour Fleece lining- (NOTE this is the non seam taped model-See Antero II for seam taped version) Breathability helps disperse moisture from the body that would be retained by an ordinary hardshell. Easily warm enough for temps into the minus teens with proper base layers. Named for the 14,276 ft peak in the Colorado Sawatch Mountain Range. Zippers can be easily operated with gloved hand * Wind-block panel behind front zipper * Interior has 2 non-closing, roomy pockets to carry skins or extra goggles and one nice sized zippered pocket * Exterior has three YKK zippered pockets, including two side pockets which are single-sided and fleece-lined * Dual-adjusting cinch that serves as a powder skirt when needed. The Antero represents the pinnacle of American-Made Quality and technology at an affordable price. Large weighs 1006 grams. Two word summary....Bomber Proof! name: 'Torrey' Polartec Wicking Mid Layer Made in Colorado
description:
Ships around December 10th, 2013 (Guaranteed to arrive before Christmas)

Polartec Polyester wicking with grids Mid layer.  Perfect for wearing under our jackets.  The hood is form fitting to head with a nice cinch. Hood designed to be used as face mask if needed.   Hoodie worn with a short or long sleeve base layer is about all you need under our jackets in active settings.  Great tool around town garment as well.

The Torrey model in a size Large weighs 11 oz 
The Bross model size Large weighs 14 oz 

Made in Colorado USA

name: Boot Pack 1 Ski & Snowboard Carry System Made in Colorado
description:
Boot Pack 1 (BP1) Reg Price $44.95

Ski & Snowboard Carry System

Eliminates need for a back pack 
Rolls up and fits in pocket when finished using

Allows for carrying your skis or board on your back thus freeing your hands for climbing or using poles from treks originating inbounds. The BP1 is a great way to really make fast time in slack , side, and hike to country or when yo-yo-ing.   No need to carry a back back yet still have a system to carry shovel and probe. The BP1 resides compact in your pocket until you get to your bootpack start point. The BP1 comes with elastic shoulder straps to use with your shovel. The straps will work with either a "T" or "D" handle shovel. When not in use the BP1 can be rolled up in your palm and stowed in your pocket and your shovel and probe may be then worn on your back while you ski or ride. BP1 is light weight at just 165 grams, yet is constructed of heavy duty USA produced Nylon webbing and is sewn using heavy duty UV rated nylon thread in Leadville, Colorado. BP1 threads are a huge step above the polyesters that most pack manufacturers utilize. This product is 100% made and constructed in America. The BP1 has a lifetime replacement or repair warranty.

categories.name: Ski, Skin and Snowboard Carry Systems

name: Skin Pouch 1 Low Profile Skin Carrier Made in Colorado
description:
Reg Price $44.95


Skin Pouch 1 Low Profile Skin Carrier

This is not your father's fanny pack. The SP1 is a patent pending development of Freeride Systems specifically for carrying a pair of climbing skins in a low profile position around the waist. The SP1 eliminates the need for carrying a back pack or stuffing skins inside your jacket while skiing or splitboarding in slack, side, "hike to", or back country settings. The SP1 is light weight but very strong constructed of 400 Denier Ripstop Nylon and heavy duty UV resistant nylon thread with a tensile strength of 7 lbs. A YKK 2 way heavy duty zipper allows access from either side. The SP1 will easily accommodate any length of skins as well as sizes up to 140mm in width. There might even be room for a sandwhich or an SC1 in there as well. All SP1 materials are made in the USA. The SP1 is constructed in Leadville, Colorado. Shipping $5.00 when ordered alone, or adds $2 with other items.

name: Prospect Pants Brand
description:
$85,000 No discount codes or sale codes apply to this listing.

Made in USA pants brand, assets, and how to run business.

Yep, the brand is for sale.   Why?  Freeride Systems and fulsus USA are taking all the owners time and resources.  And, now with the signing of a national/worldwide media account, even less time and resources will be available.

Sale includes:
1. All patterns and designs
2. All current inventory
3. trademark and logo
4. The Prospect Pants promotional vehicle (see picture)
5. How to tour of sewing pants in Los Angeles 
6. All supply chain contacts
7. Domain name www.prospectpants.com
8. Placement with 4 National online retailers
9. Placement with approximately 6 brick n mortar retailers

May be combined with real estate in Leadville, Colorado so a mortgage may be acquired on package.  $260,000.00
